metadata.title: CVE-2024-34402 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in uriparser through 0.9.7. ComposeQueryEngine inUriQuery.c has an integer overflow via long keys or values, with aresultant buffer overflow.

criterions.comment: uriparser package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
